Task Force to Stop Price Gouging Act of 2024
To establish the Task Force to Stop Price Gouging, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
